titles.title: Keeping Capital Local for Underserved Communities Act of 2017
Keeping Capital Local for Underserved Communities Act of 2017

A bill to amend the Federal Deposit Insurance Act to ensure that the reciprocal deposits of an insured depository institution are not considered to be funds obtained by or through a deposit broker, and for other purposes.
Keeping Capital Local for Underserved Communities Act of 2017

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.
